name: Kylie-Badjo
description:
Unfinished prototype made for Global Game Jam 2022 (theme: duality)

In the enchanted forest lives Kylie the coyote and Badjo the badger. They sing their songs as they roam around their territories hunting pesky gophers with skills unique to each of them. After years of living together they've learned to recognize one another's songs and now only hunt together! The goal of the game is to make sure Kylie & Badjo both get fed.

  • Victory is not implemented, but if you get both animal's food bars to green give yourself a pat on the back :)
  • Gophers require 2 hits to eat. Once to stun them, and another to eat them
  • There are multiple strategies for hunting well so play around!
  • Move: W/D or Left/Right
  • Action: Space
    • Jump as Kylie
    • Slash as Badjo

This game was made by the 5x Train team for Global Game Jam 2022
